column1: @arthurblake Turning recirc off, windows closed and the right film on rear glass usually works. Am asking HVAC engineering to investigate.
@arthurblake Tesla service can do coating or can be done by any auto glass coating company. My car is done on side & rear
@arthurblake Turn off AC recirc, so that cool air flows out thru rear vents & get IR coating on rear glass.
